MAN.TITLE: xstringl
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: compute a box which surrounds strings

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : vector of 4 real scalars defining the box.
: real scalars, coordinates of the lower-left point of the strings.
: an integer specifying the font type.
: an integer specifying the font size.

DESCRIPTION.P: xstringl returns in rect=[x,y,w,h] (upper-left point, width, height) the size of a rectangle in the current graphic scale which would surround the strings str drawn at location x,y (lower-left point).
The result can be approximative when using the Postscript driver.
